companies.name: Grupo Nobis
companies.other_information: Grupo Nobis is an Ecuadorian conglomerate with a wide range of companies in sectors such as construction, engineering, agriculture, and more.

companies.name: Holcim Ecuador
companies.other_information: Holcim Ecuador is a leading company in the production and distribution of cement, concrete, and aggregates in the country.

companies.name: Inaesin
companies.address: Av. Francisco de Orellana, Edificio Blue Building, Guayaquil
companies.other_information: Inaesin is an Ecuadorian company specializing in engineering and inspection services for construction and infrastructure projects.

companies.name: Tame EP
companies.address: José Joaquín de Olmedo International Airport, Guayaquil
companies.other_information: Tame EP is the state-owned airline of Ecuador, operating domestic and international flights from its bases in Quito and Guayaquil.

companies.name: Cervecería Nacional
companies.other_information: Cervecería Nacional is the leading beer producer in Ecuador, with a wide variety of popular brands in the market.

companies.name: Automotores y Anexos
companies.other_information: Automotores y Anexos is an Ecuadorian company dedicated to the import and distribution of vehicles and automotive parts.

companies.name: Fybeca
companies.other_information: Fybeca is the leading pharmacy chain in Ecuador, offering a wide range of pharmaceutical and health products.
